Key Match Events: Cleveland Guardians clinched their spot in the postseason with a walk-off single by Andrés Giménez in extra innings
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt was praised by his team for his leadership and management style
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians are aiming to clinch the division title as early as Saturday in St. Louis
Others: The Guardians' bullpen has a Major League-best ERA under Vogt's management
